CREATE PROC [dbo].[FAMS_AverageLOS]
AS BEGIN

	DECLARE
		@FraudParameterId	INT
	,	@FraudScore			INT

	SELECT 
		@FraudParameterId = F.FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore = F.FraudScore

	FROM FraudParameters F WHERE F.FraudParameterCode =  'Average LOS >= 4 days'

	CREATE TABLE #Temp
	(
		ClaimFormDetailId	INT
	,	HospitalId			INT
	,	HospitalName		VARCHAR(150)
	,	DateAdmit			DATETIME
	,	DateDischarge		DATETIME
	,	LengthofStay		DECIMAL(19,2)
	)

	INSERT INTO #Temp 
	SELECT 
		C.claim_form_detail_id
	,	P.provider_id
	,	P.last_name
	,	C.date_of_Admit
	,	C.date_of_Discharge
	,	DATEDIFF(Day,C.date_of_Admit,C.date_of_Discharge) AS LengthofStay

	FROM claim_form_details C
	INNER JOIN providers P ON C.hosp_id = P.provider_id
	WHERE
		ISNULL(C.parent_claim_form_id,0) <> 0

		DELETE L FROM dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter L WHERE L.FraudParameterId = @FraudParameterId

		INSERT INTO dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter
		(
			ClaimFormDetailId
		,	FraudParameterId
		,	FraudScore
		)
		SELECT 
			T.ClaimFormDetailId 
		,	@FraudParameterId
		,	@FraudScore

		FROM #Temp T 
		INNER JOIN 
		(
			SELECT T.HospitalId  
			FROM #Temp T			
			GROUP BY
				T.HospitalId
			HAVING 
				AVG(T.lengthofStay) >= 4
		) AS B ON T.HospitalId = B.HospitalId

		DROP TABLE #Temp

		END

-- DROP FUNCTION [dbo].[DelimitedSplit8K]

CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[DelimitedSplit]
        (@pString VARCHAR(8000), @pDelimiter CHAR(1))
RETURNS TABLE WITH SCHEMABINDING AS
 RETURN
--===== "Inline" CTE Driven "Tally Table" produces values from 0 up to 10,000...
     -- enough to cover NVARCHAR(4000)
  WITH E1(N) AS (
                 SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL 
                 SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL 
                 SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1
                ),                          --10E+1 or 10 rows
       E2(N) AS (SELECT 1 FROM E1 a, E1 b), --10E+2 or 100 rows
       E4(N) AS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 a, E2 b), --10E+4 or 10,000 rows max
 cteTally(N) AS (--==== This provides the "base" CTE and limits the number of rows right up front
                     -- for both a performance gain and prevention of accidental "overruns"
                 SELECT TOP (ISNULL(DATALENGTH(@pString),0)) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) FROM E4
                ),
cteStart(N1) AS (--==== This returns N+1 (starting position of each "element" just once for each delimiter)
                 SELECT 1 UNION ALL
                 SELECT t.N+1 FROM cteTally t WHERE SUBSTRING(@pString,t.N,1) = @pDelimiter
                ),
cteLen(N1,L1) AS(--==== Return start and length (for use in substring)
                 SELECT s.N1,
                        ISNULL(NULLIF(CHARINDEX(@pDelimiter,@pString,s.N1),0)-s.N1,8000)
                   FROM cteStart s
                )
--===== Do the actual split. The ISNULL/NULLIF combo handles the length for the final element when no delimiter is found.
 SELECT ItemNumber = ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY l.N1),
        Item       = SUBSTRING(@pString, l.N1, l.L1)
   FROM cteLen l
;

CREATE PROC [dbo].[FAMS_AverageLOS] AS BEGIN

	DECLARE
		@FraudParameterId	INT
	,	@FraudScore			INT

	SELECT 
		@FraudParameterId = F.FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore = F.FraudScore

	FROM FraudParameters F WHERE F.FraudParameterCode =  'Avg LOS >= 4 days'

	CREATE TABLE #Temp
	(
		ClaimFormDetailId	INT
	,	HospitalId			INT
	,	HospitalName		VARCHAR(150)
	,	DateAdmit			DATETIME
	,	DateDischarge		DATETIME
	,	LengthofStay		DECIMAL(19,2)
	)

	INSERT INTO #Temp 
	SELECT 
		C.ClaimFormDetailId
	,	P.HospitalId
	,	P.HospitalName
	,	C.DateofAdmit
	,	C.DateofDischarge
	,	DATEDIFF(Day,C.DateofAdmit,C.DateofDischarge) AS LengthofStay

	FROM FactClaimDetails C
	INNER JOIN DimHospitalDetails P ON C.HospitalId = P.HospitalId
	 
		DELETE L FROM dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter L WHERE L.FraudParameterId = @FraudParameterId

		INSERT INTO dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter
		(
			ClaimFormDetailId
		,	FraudParameterId
		,	FraudScore
		)
		SELECT 
			T.ClaimFormDetailId 
		,	@FraudParameterId
		,	@FraudScore

		FROM #Temp T 
		INNER JOIN 
		(
			SELECT T.HospitalId  
			FROM #Temp T			
			GROUP BY
				T.HospitalId
			HAVING 
				AVG(T.lengthofStay) >= 4
		) AS B ON T.HospitalId = B.HospitalId

		DROP TABLE #Temp

		END
GO

CREATE PROC [dbo].[FAMS_GroupPolicyGreaterThan10Percent] AS BEGIN

	DECLARE
		@FraudParameterId	INT
	,	@FraudScore			INT

	SELECT 
		@FraudParameterId = F.FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore = F.FraudScore

	FROM FraudParameters F WHERE F.FraudParameterCode =  'Group policy Claims is more than 10%'
 
	CREATE TABLE #GroupHospitalClaims
	(
		EmployerId			INT
	,	HospitalId			INT
	,	NoofClaim			INT
	,	TotalNoofClaims		INT
	,	ClaimsPercent		DECIMAL(19,2)
	)

	INSERT INTO #GroupHospitalClaims (EmployerId, HospitalId, NoofClaim)
	SELECT 
		E.employerid
	,	P.HospitalId
	,	COUNT(C.claimformdetailid)

	FROM FactClaimDetails C
	INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MD ON MD.member_detail_id = C.memberdetailid
	INNER JOIN DimEmployers E ON E.employerid = MD.employer_id 
	INNER JOIN DimHospitalDetails P ON C.HospitalId = P.HospitalId	 		
	WHERE
		ISNULL(MD.Employer_Id,0) <> 0 
	GROUP BY
		E.employerid
	,	P.HospitalId
 

	UPDATE G
	SET G.TotalNoofClaims = A.TotalNoofClaims
	FROM #GroupHospitalClaims G
	INNER JOIN 
	(
	SELECT G.employerid, SUM(G.NoofClaim) As TotalNoofClaims 
	FROM #GroupHospitalClaims G 
	GROUP BY
		G.employerid
	)AS A ON A.EmployeriD = G.EmployerID

	UPDATE G
	SET G.ClaimsPercent = (CONVERT(DECIMAL(19,2),G.Noofclaim)/CONVERT(DECIMAL(19,2),G.TotalNoofClaims))*100 
	FROM #GroupHospitalClaims G

	DELETE L FROM dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter L WHERE L.FraudParameterId = @FraudParameterId

	INSERT INTO dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter
	(
		ClaimFormDetailId
	,	FraudParameterId
	,	FraudScore
	)
	SELECT 
		C.Claimformdetailid 
	,	@FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore

	FROM FactClaimDetails C 
	INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MD ON MD.member_detail_id = C.memberdetailid
	INNER JOIN DimEmployers E ON E.employerid = MD.employer_id 
	INNER JOIN DimHospitalDetails P ON C.HospitalId = P.HospitalId
	INNER JOIN #GroupHospitalClaims G ON G.HospitalId = P.Hospitalid AND  G.EmployerID = MD.Employer_Id
	WHERE 
		G.ClaimsPercent >= 10
		 
		 
	DROP TABLE #GroupHospitalClaims

END
GO

ALTER PROC [dbo].[InsClaimsSummary] AS
BEGIN


    DELETE CS FROM load.ClaimsSummary CS


    INSERT INTO load.ClaimsSummary
    (
    	[ClaimFIRNo]
    ,	[ClaimType]
    ,	[HospitalizationType]
    ,	[ClassofAccommodation]
    ,	[Procedure]
    ,	[Diagnosis]
    ,	[PolicyNo]
    ,	[PolicyType]
    ,   [member_code]
    ,	[FullMemberName]
    ,	[Gender]
    ,	[Age]
    ,	[Hospital]
    ,	[Corporate]
    ,	[LengthofStay]
    ,	[IsFraudClaim]
    ,	[FraudScore]
    ,	[ClaimAmount]
    ,	[ClaimDate]
    )
    SELECT 
        C.ClaimFormDetailId AS 'Claim FIR No'
    ,   CASE 
            WHEN C.ClaimType = 0 THEN 'Cashless'
        ELSE 'Reimbursement' END AS 'Claim Type'
    ,	C.ClaimCategory AS 'Hospitalization Type'
    ,	C.ClassofAccommodation
    ,	CPT.CptDescription AS 'Procedure'
    ,	Icd.IcdDescription AS 'Diagnosis'
    ,	MDT.policyNo
    ,	CASE WHEN MDt.employer_id = 0 THEN 'Individual Policy' ELSE 'Group Policy' END AS 'Policy Type'
    ,	M.member_code
    ,	M.FullMemberName
    ,	CASE WHEN M.sex = 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE 'Male' END AS 'Gender'
    ,	DATEDIFF(YEAR,M.date_birth, GETDATE()) AS 'Age'
    ,	P.HospitalName AS 'Hospital'
    --,	PN.ProviderNetworkType_Desc AS 'Provider Network Type'
    ,   Emp.EmployerName AS 'Corporate'
    ,	DATEDIFF(DAY,C.DateofAdmit, C.DateofDischarge) AS 'Length of Stay'
    ,	CASE WHEN A.ClaimFormDetailId IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS 'IsFraudClaim'
    ,	A.FraudScore AS 'Fraud Score'
    ,	L.Net AS 'Claim Amount'
    ,	C.DateofAdmit AS 'Claim Date'

    FROM FactClaimDetails C 
    INNER JOIN LnkClaimProcedureDetails L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId
    INNER JOIN DimProcedureCodes Cpt ON Cpt.CptCodeId = L.CptCodeId
    INNER JOIN LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes Licd ON Licd.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId
    INNER JOIN DimDiagnosisCodes Icd ON Icd.IcdCodeId = Licd.IcdCodeId 
    INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MDT ON MDt.member_detail_id = C.MemberDetailId
    INNER JOIN DimMembers M ON M.member_id = MDT.member_id
    INNER JOIN DimHospitalDetails P ON P.HospitalId = C.HospitalId
    --INNER JOIN  Provider_NetworkType PN ON PN.ProviderNetworkType_Id = P.Provider_NetworkType
    LEFT OUTER JOIN DimEmployers EMP ON Emp.EmployerId = MDT.employer_id
    LEFT OUTER JOIN
    (
        SELECT F.ClaimFormDetailId, SUM(L.FraudScore) AS FraudScore
        FROM FactClaimDetails F 
        INNER JOIN LnkClaimFraudParameter L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = F.ClaimFormDetailId
        GROUP BY
            F.ClaimFormDetailId
    ) A ON A.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId


	TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.ClaimsSummary

	INSERT INTO dbo.ClaimsSummary
	SELECT * FROM load.ClaimsSummary

END
GO

CREATE PROC [dbo].[UpsertLnkClaimProcedureDetails] AS
BEGIN

Update
	ld
SET
  ClaimFormDetailId= ld.ClaimFormDetailId
, CptCodeId= ld.CptCodeId
, Billed= ld.Billed
, Net= ld.Net
, NoofServices= ld.NoofServices
, PlaceofServiceId= ld.PlaceofServiceId
, Amount= ld.Amount
, ParentServiceProcedureId= ld.ParentServiceProcedureId
, GrossAmount= ld.GrossAmount
, ServiceStartDate= ld.ServiceStartDate
, ServiceEndDate= ld.ServiceEndDate
, BilledGross= ld.BilledGross
, ServiceNet= ld.ServiceNet
FROM Load.ClaimProcedureDetails ld
INNER JOIN dbo.LnkClaimProcedureDetails  lcd ON ld.ClaimProcedureId = lcd.ClaimProcedureId

INSERT INTO dbo.LnkClaimProcedureDetails
(
	ClaimProcedureId
,	ClaimFormDetailId
,	CptCodeId
,	Billed
,	Net
,	NoofServices
,	PlaceofServiceId
,	Amount
,	ParentServiceProcedureId
,	GrossAmount
,	ServiceStartDate
,	ServiceEndDate
,	BilledGross
,	ServiceNet
)
SELECT
	ld.ClaimProcedureId
,	ld.ClaimFormDetailId
,	ld.CptCodeId
,	ld.Billed
,	ld.Net
,	ld.NoofServices
,	ld.PlaceofServiceId
,	ld.Amount
,	ld.ParentServiceProcedureId
,	ld.GrossAmount
,	ld.ServiceStartDate
,	ld.ServiceEndDate
,	ld.BilledGross
,	ld.ServiceNet
FROM Load.ClaimProcedureDetails ld
LEFT JOIN dbo.LnkClaimProcedureDetails  lcd ON ld.ClaimProcedureId = lcd.ClaimProcedureId
WHERE lcd.ClaimProcedureId IS NULL

END

IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[FAMS_AverageLOS]', 'P') IS NOT NULL
    DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[FAMS_AverageLOS]
GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[FAMS_AverageLOS] AS 
BEGIN
	DECLARE
		@FraudParameterId	INT
	,	@FraudScore			INT

	SELECT 
		@FraudParameterId = F.FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore = F.FraudScore

	FROM FraudParameters F WHERE F.FraudParameterCode =  'Avg LOS >= 4 days'

	CREATE TABLE #Temp
	(
		ClaimFormDetailId	INT
	,	HospitalId			INT
	,	HospitalName		VARCHAR(150)
	,	DateAdmit			DATETIME
	,	DateDischarge		DATETIME
	,	LengthofStay		DECIMAL(19,2)
	)

	INSERT INTO #Temp 
	SELECT 
		C.ClaimFormDetailId
	,	P.HospitalId
	,	P.HospitalName
	,	C.DateofAdmit
	,	C.DateofDischarge
	,	DATEDIFF(Day,C.DateofAdmit,C.DateofDischarge) AS LengthofStay

	FROM FactClaimDetails C
	INNER JOIN DimHospitalDetails P ON C.HospitalId = P.HospitalId
	 
		DELETE L FROM dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter L WHERE L.FraudParameterId = @FraudParameterId

		INSERT INTO dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter
		(
			ClaimFormDetailId
		,	FraudParameterId
		,	FraudScore
		)
		SELECT 
			T.ClaimFormDetailId 
		,	@FraudParameterId
		,	@FraudScore

		FROM #Temp T 
		INNER JOIN 
		(
			SELECT T.HospitalId  
			FROM #Temp T			
			GROUP BY
				T.HospitalId
			HAVING 
				AVG(T.lengthofStay) >= 4
		) AS B ON T.HospitalId = B.HospitalId

		DROP TABLE #Temp

		END
GO

    DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[FAMS_InsurerandHospitalCityMismatch]
GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[FAMS_InsurerandHospitalCityMismatch] AS BEGIN

	DECLARE
		@FraudParameterId	INT
	,	@FraudScore			INT

	SELECT 
		@FraudParameterId = F.FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore = F.FraudScore

	FROM FraudParameters F WHERE F.FraudParameterCode =  'Ins&Hosp City mismatch'

	DELETE L FROM dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter L WHERE L.FraudParameterId = @FraudParameterId

	INSERT INTO dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter
	(
		ClaimFormDetailId
	,	FraudParameterId
	,	FraudScore
	)
	SELECT 
		C.Claimformdetailid 
	,	@FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore

	FROM FactClaimDetails C
	INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MD ON MD.member_detail_id = C.memberdetailid
	INNER JOIN DimHospitalDetails P ON C.HospitalId = P.HospitalId	 		
	WHERE
		MD.City NOT IN ('GURGAON','DELHI','MUMBAI','KOLKATA') AND
		ISNULL(P.ProviderCity,'') <> ISNULL(MD.City,'')

 	 
END

IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[FAMS_GroupPolicyGreaterThan10Percent]', 'P') IS NOT NULL
    DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[FAMS_GroupPolicyGreaterThan10Percent]
GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[FAMS_GroupPolicyGreaterThan10Percent] AS BEGIN

	DECLARE
		@FraudParameterId	INT
	,	@FraudScore			INT

	SELECT 
		@FraudParameterId = F.FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore = F.FraudScore

	FROM FraudParameters F WHERE F.FraudParameterCode =  'Grp Clm in a Hosp > 10%'
 
	CREATE TABLE #GroupHospitalClaims
	(
		EmployerId			INT
	,	HospitalId			INT
	,	NoofClaim			INT
	,	TotalNoofClaims		INT
	,	ClaimsPercent		DECIMAL(19,2)
	)

	INSERT INTO #GroupHospitalClaims (EmployerId, HospitalId, NoofClaim)
	SELECT 
		E.employerid
	,	P.HospitalId
	,	COUNT(C.claimformdetailid)

	FROM FactClaimDetails C
	INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MD ON MD.member_detail_id = C.memberdetailid
	INNER JOIN DimEmployers E ON E.employerid = MD.employer_id 
	INNER JOIN DimHospitalDetails P ON C.HospitalId = P.HospitalId	 		
	WHERE
		ISNULL(MD.Employer_Id,0) <> 0 
	GROUP BY
		E.employerid
	,	P.HospitalId
 

	UPDATE G
	SET G.TotalNoofClaims = A.TotalNoofClaims
	FROM #GroupHospitalClaims G
	INNER JOIN 
	(
	SELECT G.employerid, SUM(G.NoofClaim) As TotalNoofClaims 
	FROM #GroupHospitalClaims G 
	GROUP BY
		G.employerid
	)AS A ON A.EmployeriD = G.EmployerID

	UPDATE G
	SET G.ClaimsPercent = (CONVERT(DECIMAL(19,2),G.Noofclaim)/CONVERT(DECIMAL(19,2),G.TotalNoofClaims))*100 
	FROM #GroupHospitalClaims G

	DELETE L FROM dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter L WHERE L.FraudParameterId = @FraudParameterId

	INSERT INTO dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter
	(
		ClaimFormDetailId
	,	FraudParameterId
	,	FraudScore
	)
	SELECT 
		C.Claimformdetailid 
	,	@FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore

	FROM FactClaimDetails C 
	INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MD ON MD.member_detail_id = C.memberdetailid
	INNER JOIN DimEmployers E ON E.employerid = MD.employer_id 
	INNER JOIN DimHospitalDetails P ON C.HospitalId = P.HospitalId
	INNER JOIN #GroupHospitalClaims G ON G.HospitalId = P.Hospitalid AND  G.EmployerID = MD.Employer_Id
	WHERE 
		G.ClaimsPercent >= 10
		 
		 
	DROP TABLE #GroupHospitalClaims

END

IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[FAMS_GroupPolicyGreaterThan10PercentforaProcedure]', 'P') IS NOT NULL
    DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[FAMS_GroupPolicyGreaterThan10PercentforaProcedure]
GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[FAMS_GroupPolicyGreaterThan10PercentforaProcedure] AS BEGIN

	DECLARE
		@FraudParameterId	INT
	,	@FraudScore			INT

	SELECT 
		@FraudParameterId = F.FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore = F.FraudScore

	FROM FraudParameters F WHERE F.FraudParameterCode =  'Claims for a Proc >= 10%'
 
	CREATE TABLE #GroupHospitalClaims
	(
		EmployerId			INT
	,	ProcedureId			INT
	,	NoofClaim			INT
	,	TotalNoofClaims		INT
	,	ClaimsPercent		DECIMAL(19,2)
	)

	INSERT INTO #GroupHospitalClaims (EmployerId, ProcedureId, NoofClaim)
	SELECT 
		E.employerid
	,	P.CptCodeId
	,	COUNT(C.claimformdetailid)

	FROM FactClaimDetails C
	INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MD ON MD.member_detail_id = C.memberdetailid
	INNER JOIN DimEmployers E ON E.employerid = MD.employer_id 
	INNER JOIN LnkClaimProcedureDetails L ON L.claimformdetailid = C.claimformdetailid
	INNER JOIN DIMProcedureCodes P ON P.CptCodeId = L.CptCodeId
	INNER JOIN DimProcedureCategories PC ON PC.ProcedureCategoryId = P.ProcedureCategoryId
	WHERE
		ISNULL(MD.Employer_Id,0) <> 0 AND
		PC.ProcedureCategoryCode = 'P'
	GROUP BY
		E.employerid
	,	P.CptCodeId
 

	UPDATE G
	SET G.TotalNoofClaims = A.TotalNoofClaims
	FROM #GroupHospitalClaims G
	INNER JOIN 
	(
	SELECT G.employerid, SUM(G.NoofClaim) As TotalNoofClaims 
	FROM #GroupHospitalClaims G 
	GROUP BY
		G.employerid
	)AS A ON A.EmployeriD = G.EmployerID

	UPDATE G
	SET G.ClaimsPercent = (CONVERT(DECIMAL(19,2),G.Noofclaim)/CONVERT(DECIMAL(19,2),G.TotalNoofClaims))*100 
	FROM #GroupHospitalClaims G
	 
	DELETE L FROM dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter L WHERE L.FraudParameterId = @FraudParameterId

	INSERT INTO dbo.LnkClaimFraudParameter
	(
		ClaimFormDetailId
	,	FraudParameterId
	,	FraudScore
	)
	SELECT 
		C.Claimformdetailid 
	,	@FraudParameterId
	,	@FraudScore

	FROM FactClaimDetails C 
	INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MD ON MD.member_detail_id = C.memberdetailid
	INNER JOIN DimEmployers E ON E.employerid = MD.employer_id 
	INNER JOIN LnkClaimProcedureDetails L ON L.claimformdetailid = C.claimformdetailid
	INNER JOIN DIMProcedureCodes P ON P.CptCodeId = L.CptCodeId
	INNER JOIN DimProcedureCategories PC ON PC.ProcedureCategoryId = P.ProcedureCategoryId
	INNER JOIN #GroupHospitalClaims G ON G.ProcedureId = P.CptCodeId AND  G.EmployerID = MD.Employer_Id
	WHERE 
		G.ClaimsPercent >= 10 AND
		PC.ProcedureCategoryCode = 'P'
		 
		 
	DROP TABLE #GroupHospitalClaims

END

    DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[InsFactClaimDetailsExternalTPA]
GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[InsFactClaimDetailsExternalTPA] AS 
BEGIN

		DECLARE 
		@MaxMemberId			INT 
	,	@MaxMemberDetailId		INT
	,	@MaxFactClaimDetailId	INT
	,	@ClaimType				VARCHAR(50) = 'Reimbursement'
		
	SELECT @MaxMemberId = MAX(D.Member_Id) FROM DimMembers D WHERE D.IsExternalTPA = 1
	SELECT @MaxMemberDetailId = MAX(D.Member_Detail_Id) FROM DimMemberDetails D WHERE D.IsExternalTPA = 1
	SELECT @MaxFactClaimDetailId = MAX(D.MemberDetailId) FROM FactClaimDetails D WHERE D.IsExternalTPAClaim = 1


	SELECT @MaxMemberId = CASE WHEN @MaxMemberId IS NULL THEN 100000 ELSE @MaxMemberId+1 END
	SELECT @MaxMemberDetailId = CASE WHEN @MaxMemberDetailId IS NULL THEN 1000000 ELSE @MaxMemberDetailId+1 END
	SELECT @MaxFactClaimDetailId = CASE WHEN @MaxFactClaimDetailId IS NULL THEN 1000000 ELSE @MaxFactClaimDetailId+1 END
		
		
	DECLARE @s VARCHAR(max);
    DECLARE @s1 VARCHAR(max);

		set @s = N'
			   
		CREATE TABLE #DimMembers
		(
			Member_id		INT IDENTITY('+CONVERT(NVARCHAR,@MaxMemberId)+',1)
		,	Member_Code		VARCHAR(200)
		,	First_Name		VARCHAR(200)
		,	Date_Birth		DATETIME
		,	FullMemberName	VARCHAR(200)
		)
		
		INSERT INTO #DimMembers
		(
			Member_Code
		,	First_Name
		,	Date_Birth
		,	FullMemberName
		)
		SELECT DISTINCT
		
			E.Member_ID
		,	E.INSURED_NAME
		,	DATEADD(yy,-CONVERT(INT,E.Age),GETDATE())	 
		,	E.INSURED_NAME	

		FROM load.ExternalTPAData E
		LEFT OUTER JOIN DimMembers M ON M.Member_Code = E.Member_ID AND M.IsExternalTPA = 1
		WHERE
			M.Member_Code IS NULL
			
		INSERT INTO DimMembers
		(	
			Member_Id
		,	Member_Code
		,	First_Name
		,	Date_Birth
		,	FullMemberName
		,	IsExternalTPA
		)
		SELECT 
			Member_Id
		,	Member_Code
		,	First_Name
		,	Date_Birth
		,	FullMemberName
		,	1

		FROM #DimMembers	

		CREATE TABLE #DimMemberDetails
		(
			Member_Detail_id		INT IDENTITY('+CONVERT(NVARCHAR,@MaxMemberDetailId)+',1)
		,	Member_Id				INT
		,	Start_effective_date	DATETIME
		,	End_effective_Date		DATETIME
		,	Employer_id				INT
		,	ProductTypeId			INT
		,	City					VARCHAR(200)
		,	State					VARCHAR(200)
		,	Member_code_tmp			VARCHAR(200)
		,	AccountNo				VARCHAR(200)
		,	Bank_Code				VARCHAR(200)
		,	PolicyType				VARCHAR(200)
		,	ProductId				INT
		,	PolicyNo				VARCHAR(200)
		,	SumInsured				DECIMAL(19,2)
		,	Premium					DECIMAL(19,2)
		,	RelationId				INT
		,	PlanId					INT
		,	EmployeeNo				VARCHAR(200)
		,	Member_insurer_Id		INT	
		,	Country					INT
		,	Policy_from_date		DATETIME
		,	Policy_to_date			DATETIME	
		,	ContractId				INT
		)
		
		INSERT INTO #DimMemberDetails
		(
			Member_Id
		,	Start_effective_date
		,	End_effective_Date
		,	Employer_id		 
		,	City
		,	State
		,	Member_code_tmp
		,	AccountNo
		,	PolicyNo
		,	RelationId
		,	EmployeeNo
		,	Policy_from_date
		,	Policy_to_date
		)
		SELECT DISTINCT
			M.Member_Id
		,	CONVERT(DATETIME,LEFT(E.[Policy_start_ date],10))
		,	CONVERT(DATETIME,LEFT(E.Policy_end_date,10))
		,	Em.EmployerId 
		,	E.[Payee City]
		,	E.[Payee State]
		,	E.[Member_ID]
		,	E.PAYEE_ACCT
		,	E.[POLICY_NO]
		,	R.[RelationshipCode]
		,	E.[Employee_No]
		,	CONVERT(DATETIME,LEFT(E.[Policy_start_ date],10))
		,	CONVERT(DATETIME,LEFT(E.[Policy_end_date],10))
			
		FROM Load.ExternalTPAData E
		INNER JOIN DimMembers M ON M.Member_Code = E.Member_ID AND M.IsExternalTPA = 1
		LEFT OUTER JOIN DimMemberDetails MD ON M.Member_Id = MD.Member_ID AND MD.PolicyNo = E.POLICY_NO AND MD.IsExternalTPA = 1
		LEFT OUTER JOIN DimEmployers Em ON Em.EmployerName = E.[Group name]
		INNER JOIN DIMRelationship R ON R.Description = E.[Consolidated Relation]
		WHERE
			MD.Member_detail_id IS NULL

 		
		INSERT INTO DimMemberDetails
		(
			Member_detail_id
		,	Member_Id
		,	Start_effective_date
		,	End_effective_Date
		,	Employer_id		 
		,	City
		,	State
		,	Member_code_tmp
		,	AccountNo
		,	PolicyNo
		,	RelationshipID
		,	Employee_No
		,	Policy_from_date
		,	Policy_to_date
		,	IsExternalTPA
		)
		SELECT DISTINCT
			Member_detail_id
		,	Member_Id
		,	Start_effective_date
		,	End_effective_Date
		,	Employer_id		 
		,	City
		,	State
		,	Member_code_tmp
		,	AccountNo
		,	PolicyNo
		,	RelationId
		,	EmployeeNo
		,	Policy_from_date
		,	Policy_to_date
		,	1
		
		FROM #DimMemberDetails MD
		'
set @s1 = N'CREATE TABLE #FactClaimDetails
		(
			[ClaimFormDetailId] [int] IDENTITY('+CONVERT(NVARCHAR,@MaxFactClaimDetailId)+',1) ,
			--[ClaimFormDetailId] [int] IDENTITY(1000000,1) ,
			[ClaimFIRNo] [varchar](50) NULL,
			[ClaimType] [bit] NULL,
			[AmountBilled] [money] NULL,
			[AmountNet] [money] NULL,
			[AmountPaid] [money] NULL,
			[HospitalId] [int] NULL,
			[ClaimStatusId] [int] NULL,
			[DatePaid] [datetime] NULL,
			--[DateReceived] [datetime] NULL,
			[DateofAdmit] [datetime] NULL,
			[DateofDocumentation] [datetime] NULL,
			[DateofDischarge] [datetime] NULL,
			[DateModified] [datetime] NULL,
			[MemberDetailId] [int] NULL,
			[Diagnosis]	[varchar](200) NULL, 
			[Procedure]	[varchar](200) NULL,
			[Corporate] [varchar](100) NULL
			 
		)		

		INSERT INTO #factclaimdetails
		(
		  [ClaimFIRNo] 
		, [ClaimType] 
		, [AmountBilled] 
		, [AmountNet] 
		, [AmountPaid] 	
		, [HospitalId] 
		, [DatePaid] 
		--, [DateReceived]
		, [DateofAdmit] 	
		, [DateofDocumentation] 
		, [DateofDischarge] 
		, [DateModified] 
		, [MemberDetailId] 
		, [Corporate] 
		, [Diagnosis]
		, [Procedure]
		 
		)
				

		SELECT
	
			ET.BILL_NO							ClaimFIRNo 	
		,	CASE 
				WHEN ET.Claim_Type = '''+	@ClaimType+''' THEN 0 
				ELSE 1 END						 
		,	ET.[Claimed Amount]					AmountBilled
		,	ET.[Claimed Amount]					AmountNet
		,	ET.[Transferred Amount]				AmountPaid
		,	H.HospitalId						HospitalId
		,	CONVERT(DATETIME,LEFT(ET.[Transferred Date],10))				DatePaid
		--,	CONVERT(DATETIME,LEFT(ET.[Transferred Date],10))				DateReceived
		,	CONVERT(DATETIME,LEFT(ET.[Loss_Date],10))						DateofAdmin
		,	CONVERT(DATETIME,LEFT(ET.[Date of last document received],10))	DateofDocumentation
		,	CONVERT(DATETIME,LEFT(ET.[Date of Discharge],10))				DateofDischarge
		,	CONVERT(DATETIME,LEFT(ET.[Date Modified],10))					DateModified
		,	MD.Member_Detail_id					MemberDetailId	
		,	ET.[Group name]						Corporate
		,	ET.[Disease Description]
		,	ET.[Procedure Description]
		 
	
		FROM load.EXTERNALTPADATA ET
		LEFT OUTER JOIN Factclaimdetails F ON ET.BILL_NO = F.ClaimFIRNo AND F.IsExternalTPAClaim = 1
		LEFT OUTER JOIN DimHospitalDetails H ON ET.[Provider Name] = H.HospitalName
		LEFT OUTER JOIN DimMembers M ON M.Member_code = ET.Member_ID AND M.[IsExternalTPA] = 1
		LEFT OUTER JOIN DimMemberDetails MD ON MD.member_Id = M.member_Id and MD.PolicyNo = ET.Policy_No AND MD.[IsExternalTPA] = 1
		WHERE
			F.Claimformdetailid IS NULL

		INSERT INTO factclaimdetails
		(
		  [ClaimFIRNo] 
		, [ClaimType] 
		, [AmountBilled] 
		, [AmountNet] 
		, [AmountPaid] 	
		, [HospitalId] 
		, [DatePaid] 		 
		, [DateofAdmit] 	
		, [DateofDocumentation] 
		, [DateofDischarge] 
		, [DateModified] 
		, [MemberDetailId] 
		, [Corporate] 
		, [IsExternalTPAClaim]
		)
		SELECT 
		 
		  [ClaimFIRNo] 
		, [ClaimType] 
		, [AmountBilled] 
		, [AmountNet] 
		, [AmountPaid] 	
		, [HospitalId] 
		, [DatePaid] 
	  
		, [DateofAdmit] 	
		, [DateofDocumentation] 
		, [DateofDischarge] 
		, [DateModified] 
		, [MemberDetailId] 
		, [Corporate] 
		, 1
		
		FROM #factclaimdetails

		
		INSERT INTO [dbo].[LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes]
		(
			IcdCodeId
		,	ClaimFormDetailId
		)
		SELECT 
			D.IcdCodeId
		,	F.ClaimFormDetailId
		 
		FROM #FactClaimDetails F
		LEFT OUTER JOIN LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = F.ClaimformDetailId
		INNER JOIN dbo.DimDiagnosisCodes D ON D.IcdDescription = F.[Diagnosis]
		WHERE
			L.ClaimDiagnosisId IS NULL


		INSERT INTO [dbo].[LnkClaimProcedureDetails]
		(
			CptCodeId
		,	ClaimFormDetailId
		)
		SELECT 
			D.CptCodeId
		,	F.ClaimFormDetailId
		  
		FROM #FactClaimDetails F
		LEFT OUTER JOIN LnkClaimProcedureDetails L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = F.ClaimformDetailId
		INNER JOIN dbo.DimProcedureCodes D ON D.CptDescription = F.[Procedure]
		WHERE
			L.ClaimProcedureId IS NULL
		
		DROP TABLE #DimMembers		
		DROP TABLE #DimMemberDetails
		DROP TABLE #factclaimdetails
			'
		EXEC (@s);
        EXEC (@s1);
			
		 
	END


GO

CREATE PROC [dbo].[InsClaimsSummary] AS
BEGIN  
  
  
    DELETE CS FROM load.ClaimsSummary CS  
  
  
    INSERT INTO load.ClaimsSummary  
    (  
     [ClaimFIRNo]  
    , [ClaimType]  
    , [HospitalizationType]  
    , [ClassofAccommodation]  
    , [Procedure]  
    , [Diagnosis]  
    , [PolicyNo]  
    , [PolicyType]  
    , [member_code]  
    , [FullMemberName]  
    , [Gender]  
    , [Age]  
    , [Hospital]  
    , [Corporate]  
    , [LengthofStay]  
    , [IsFraudClaim]  
    , [FraudScore]  
    , [ClaimAmount]  
    , [ClaimDate]
	, [ProcedureAmount]
	, [HospitalCity] 
	, [HospitalState] 
	, [MemberCity] 
	, [MemberState]
    )  
    SELECT   
        C.ClaimFormDetailId AS 'Claim FIR No'  
    ,   CASE   
            WHEN C.ClaimType = 0 THEN 'Cashless'  
        ELSE 'Reimbursement' END AS 'Claim Type'  
    , C.ClaimCategory AS 'Hospitalization Type'  
    , C.ClassofAccommodation  
    , CPT.CptDescription AS 'Procedure'  
    , Icd.IcdDescription AS 'Diagnosis'  
    , MDT.policyNo  
    , CASE WHEN MDt.employer_id = 0 THEN 'Individual Policy' ELSE 'Group Policy' END AS 'Policy Type'  
    , M.member_code  
    , M.FullMemberName  
    , CASE WHEN M.sex = 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE 'Male' END AS 'Gender'  
    , DATEDIFF(YEAR,M.date_birth, GETDATE()) AS 'Age'  
    , P.HospitalName AS 'Hospital'  
    --, PN.ProviderNetworkType_Desc AS 'Provider Network Type'  
    ,   Emp.EmployerName AS 'Corporate'  
    , DATEDIFF(DAY,C.DateofAdmit, C.DateofDischarge) AS 'Length of Stay'  
    , CASE WHEN A.ClaimFormDetailId IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS 'IsFraudClaim'  
    , A.FraudScore AS 'Fraud Score'  
    , C.AmountNet AS 'Claim Amount'  
    , C.DateofAdmit AS 'Claim Date'  
	, L.Net AS 'ProcedureAmount'
	, P.ProviderCity as HospitalCity
	, P.ProviderState as HospitalState
	, MDT.City as MemberCity
	, ST.State_name as MemberState
    FROM FactClaimDetails C   
    INNER JOIN LnkClaimProcedureDetails L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId  
    INNER JOIN DimProcedureCodes Cpt ON Cpt.CptCodeId = L.CptCodeId  
    INNER JOIN LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes Licd ON Licd.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId  
    INNER JOIN DimDiagnosisCodes Icd ON Icd.IcdCodeId = Licd.IcdCodeId   
    INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MDT ON MDt.member_detail_id = C.MemberDetailId
	INNER JOIN DimMembers M ON M.member_id = MDT.member_id  
    INNER JOIN DimHospitalDetails P ON P.HospitalId = C.HospitalId  
    --INNER JOIN  Provider_NetworkType PN ON PN.ProviderNetworkType_Id = P.Provider_NetworkType  
    LEFT OUTER JOIN DimEmployers EMP ON Emp.EmployerId = MDT.employer_id  
    LEFT OUTER JOIN  
    (  
        SELECT F.ClaimFormDetailId, SUM(L.FraudScore) AS FraudScore  
        FROM FactClaimDetails F   
        INNER JOIN LnkClaimFraudParameter L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = F.ClaimFormDetailId  
        GROUP BY  
            F.ClaimFormDetailId  
    ) A ON A.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId
   LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.States ST on MDT.[state]=Cast(ST.state_id as Varchar)
  
  
 TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.ClaimsSummary  
  
 INSERT INTO dbo.ClaimsSummary  
 SELECT * FROM load.ClaimsSummary  
  
END  

END

ALTER PROC [dbo].[spExecuteDetectFraud] AS
BEGIN

TRUNCATE TABLE [Report].ClaimsFraudSummaryData

INSERT INTO [Report].ClaimsFraudSummaryData
SELECT 
      [ClaimFIRNo]
      ,[ClaimType]
      ,[HospitalizationType]
      ,[ClassofAccommodation]
      ,[Procedure]
      ,[Diagnosis]
      ,[policyNo]
      ,[PolicyType]
      ,[member_code]
      ,[FullMemberName]
      ,[Gender]
      ,[Age]
      ,[Hospital]
      ,[Corporate]
      ,[LengthofStay]
      ,[output_label1] IsFraudClaim
      ,[FraudScore]
      ,[ClaimAmount]
      ,[ClaimDate] 
FROM PREDICT (MODEL = (Select model from dbo.MLModel_automated where id=(select MAX(id) from dbo.MLModel_automated)),
-- FROM PREDICT (MODEL = (SELECT [model] FROM dbo.[ClaimsMLModelExt] WHERE [ID] = 'uiap-synapse-claims-ws-claimssummary-20210521071541-Best:2'),
             DATA = [dbo].[ClaimsSummary],
              RUNTIME = ONNX) WITH ([output_label1] [varchar])


END
GO

UPDATE ClaimsSummary
SET 
    IsFraudClaim = 0
,    [FraudScore] = 0

 

UPDATE CS
SET CS.IsFraudClaim = 1
,    CS.[FraudScore] = 10
FROM ClaimsSummary CS
INNER JOIN FactClaimDetails C ON C.ClaimFormDetailId = CS.ClaimFIRNo
INNER JOIN LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId
INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MDT ON MDT.member_detail_id = C.MemberDetailId
INNER JOIN DimMembers M ON M.member_id = MDT.member_id
WHERE
    L.IcdCodeId IN 
    (
SELECT C.IcdCodeId
FROM DimDiagnosisCodes c 
WHERE 
    C.IcdDescription LIKE '%delivery%' AND
    M.sex <> 'F')
    

 

UPDATE CS
SET CS.IsFraudClaim = 1
,    CS.[FraudScore] = 10

 

FROM ClaimsSummary CS
INNER JOIN FactClaimDetails C ON C.ClaimFormDetailId = CS.ClaimFIRNo
INNER JOIN LnkClaimDiagnosisCodes L ON L.ClaimFormDetailId = C.ClaimFormDetailId
INNER JOIN DimMemberDetails MDT ON MDT.member_detail_id = C.MemberDetailId
INNER JOIN DimMembers M ON M.member_id = MDT.member_id
WHERE
    L.IcdCodeId IN 
    (
SELECT C.IcdCodeId 
FROM DimDiagnosisCodes c 
WHERE 
    C.IcdDescription LIKE '%Heart%' AND
    Datediff(Year,M.date_birth,GETDATE())  <= 10)

from mlflow.types import DataType
from mlflow.types.schema import ColSpec, Schema

# Get best model from automl run
best_run, onnx_model = run.get_output(return_onnx_model=True)

# Define utility functions to infer the schema of ONNX model
def _infer_schema(data):
    res = []
    for _, col in enumerate(data):
        t = col.type.replace("tensor(", "").replace(")", "")
        if t in ["bool"]:
            dt = DataType.boolean
        elif t in ["int8", "uint8", "int16", "uint16", "int32"]:
            dt = DateType.integer
        elif t in ["uint32", "int64"]:
            dt = DataType.long
        elif t in ["float16", "bfloat16", "float"]:
            dt = DataType.float
        elif t in ["double"]:
            dt = DataType.double
        elif t in ["string"]:
            dt = DataType.string
        else:
            raise Exception("Unsupported type: " + t)
        res.append(ColSpec(type=dt, name=col.name))
    return Schema(res)

def _infer_signature(onnx_model):
    onnx_model_bytes = onnx_model.SerializeToString()
    onnx_runtime = onnxruntime.InferenceSession(onnx_model_bytes)
    # print(onnx_runtime.get_inputs())
    # print(onnx_runtime.get_outputs())
    inputs = _infer_schema(onnx_runtime.get_inputs())
    outputs = _infer_schema(onnx_runtime.get_outputs())
    return ModelSignature(inputs, outputs)

# Infer signature of ONNX model
signature = _infer_signature(onnx_model)

artifact_path = experiment_name + "_artifact"
mlflow.set_tracking_uri(ws.get_mlflow_tracking_uri())
mlflow.set_experiment(experiment_name)

with mlflow.start_run() as run:
    # Save the model to the outputs directory for capture
    mlflow.onnx.log_model(onnx_model, artifact_path, signature=signature)
    Run_Id = run.info.run_id
    # Register the model to AML model registry
    mlflow.register_model("runs:/" + run.info.run_id + "/" + artifact_path, "uiap-synapse-claims-ws-fraud-detection-model-Best")

def writeto_sql(dataframe, tableName, jdbcConnection):
    dataframe.write \
    .format("jdbc") \
    .mode("overwrite") \
    .option("url", jdbcConnection) \
    .option("dbtable", tableName) \
    .save()
    print("Data Written Successfully")

    """

    email fields that need to be anonymized.

    # Load faker

### Health Insurance Fraud Claim Detection using Unsupervised Machine Learning !

Health insurance fraud can be explained as a situation where an insured or medical service provider furnishes fraud, false or misleading information to the insurer with the intention to attain unfair benefits from a policy for the policy holder or service providing source. Such fraud leads to serious losses for the insurance service providers but it could also result in impacting the health insurance advantage for genuine customers. Also, semi-urban and rural areas have witnessed more cases of health insurance as compared to metro cities.

Most common health insurance frauds: It is a difficult task to explain the types of health insurance frauds as the nature of deceit keeps changing over the years. The most common types of frauds are listed below;
  • Filing a claim for treatments or services that were never administered. This is often done by forging genuine patient information and manufacturing admission in connivance with service providers.
  • Increasing overall cost of hospitalisation by including treatments that were not necessary basis the medical problem.
  • Misrepresenting treatments that are not covered as medically necessary.
  • Non-disclosure of Pre-Existing Diseases and manufacturing diagnosis reports to justify tests, examinations and surgeries to prove claim worthiness.

Dataset Information :
  • Claim FIR No: Claim First Investigation Report Number
  • Claim Type : Claim Categoreies
  • Hospitalization Type: Mode of Hospitalization
  • Class_of_Accommodation: Client Room Accommodation
  • Procedure: Doctor Summary Report
  • Diagnosis: Medical Diagnosis Report
  • policyNo: Claim Policy Number
  • Policy Type: Client Policy Type
  • member_code: CLient Member Code
  • FullMemberName: Name of the Client
  • Gender: Gender
  • Age: Age
  • Hospital: Client Admitted Hospitals
  • Provider Network Type: Client Network provider
  • Corporate: Client Coporate
  • Length of Stay: Length of Stay in the hospital
  • IsFraudClaim: Type of Fraud Cliam
  • Fraud Score: Fraud Accuracy Score
  • Claim Amount: Cliam Amount
  • Claim Date: Claim Date

##### Convert String Data into Numeric Data by LabelEncoder

c1 = CountVectorizer()

pro = c2.fit_transform(ddf['Procedure'])

#### Now Our Dataset is ready for proceed for ML

fig, ax = plt.subplots(nrows=7,ncols=3, figsize=(20,10), constrained_layout=True)
plt.suptitle("Uni-Variate Outlier Data Analyis")

iforest_d = IsolationForest(n_estimators=100, max_samples='auto',contamination=0.05, max_features=1.0,bootstrap=False, n_jobs=-1, random_state=0)
iforest_t = IsolationForest(n_estimators=100, max_samples='auto',contamination=0.05, max_features=1.0,bootstrap=False, n_jobs=-1, random_state=0)

X_d=dfr.values
X_t=dft.values

pred_d = iforest_d.fit_predict(X_d)
pred_t = iforest_t.fit_predict(X_t)

scaler_d = StandardScaler()
scaler_t = StandardScaler()

ddfs=scaler_d.fit_transform(X_d)
dtfs=scaler_t.fit_transform(X_t)

# Apply PCA to reduce the dimensionality
pca_d = PCA(n_components=2)
pca_t = PCA(n_components=2)

pcd = pca_d.fit_transform(ddfs)
pct = pca_t.fit_transform(dtfs)

# Extract outliers
outlier_index_d = np.where(pred_d==-1)
outlier_index_t = np.where(pred_t==-1)

outlier_values_d = X_d[outlier_index_d]
outlier_values_t = X_t[outlier_index_t]

outlier_values_scaled_d = scaler_d.transform(outlier_values_d)
outlier_values_scaled_t = scaler_t.transform(outlier_values_t)

outlier_values_pca_d = pca_d.transform(outlier_values_scaled_d)
outlier_values_pca_t = pca_t.transform(outlier_values_scaled_t)

# Plot the data
sns.scatterplot(x=pcd[:,0], y=pcd[:,1])
sns.scatterplot(x=outlier_values_pca_d[:,0], y=outlier_values_pca_d[:,1], color='red')
plt.title("Isolation Forest Outlier Detection - Numeric Values",fontsize=15, pad=15)
plt.xlabel("PC1")
plt.xlabel("PC2")
plt.show()

# Plot the data
sns.scatterplot(x=pct[:,0], y=pct[:,1])
sns.scatterplot(x=outlier_values_pca_t[:,0], y=outlier_values_pca_t[:,1], color='red')
plt.title("Isolation Forest Outlier Detection - Text Values",fontsize=15, pad=15)
plt.xlabel("PC1")
plt.xlabel("PC2")
plt.show()

# Save the Anomaly Result 

dtest=dt.copy()
dtest['AD_D']=pred_d
dtest['AD_T']=pred_t

print("The Length of Anomaly Detection :

Numerical Values  - ",len(dtest[dtest['AD_D']==-1]),"
Textical Values   - ",len(dtest[dtest['AD_T']==-1]))
##### Direct KMeans Clustering with PCA Transformation

kmeans_d = KMeans(n_clusters=100, init='k-means++', n_init=100, max_iter=100, random_state=0)
kmeans_d.fit(pcd)
dtest['C1_KM']=kmeans_d.labels_

kmeans_t = KMeans(n_clusters=100, init='k-means++', n_init=100, max_iter=100, random_state=0)
kmeans_t.fit(pct)
dtest['C2_KM']=kmeans_t.labels_

OCRDatas = []
for ele in files:
    name = ele.name
    path = '/'+ele.path.replace(':','')
    print(path)
    with open(f'{path}/report.png', mode='rb') as pdfstream:
        resp = client.read_document(streamdata = pdfstream.read())
        parsed = client.parse(resp)
        OCRDatas.append(OrderedDict({"id": name, "text": parsed}))
### Use Azure Translator API to translate all text into common language (English)

# For Translator
subscription_key = TokenLibrary.getSecret("aimlworkathonkv","AzureTranslatorKey")
endpoint = "https://api.cognitive.microsofttranslator.com/"

# This is required if using a Cognitive Services resource.
location = "centralindia"

client = CustomTranslatorAgent(endpoint, subscription_key, location)
documents = OCRDatas # [{'id': 'CL01','text':parsed}] # bring the documents from OCR Response
output= client.translate(documents)
documents = client.parse(output, documents)
### Define Azure Text Analytics Credentials and create CustomAgent Object to make API Calls

# Define Credentials
endpoint = "https://aiml-language.cognitiveservices.azure.com" 
key = TokenLibrary.getSecret("aimlworkathonkv", "TextAnalyticsKey")
# Initialize Text analytics client
text_analytics_client = CustomTextAgent(endpoint, key)
### Use analyse_sentiment, get_keyphrases and get_entities functions to get response from API

sentiments = []
s,e=0,10
while True:
    if len(documents)==len(sentiments):
        break
    sentiment_batch = text_analytics_client.analyse_sentiment(documents[s:e])
    data = text_analytics_client.parse(sentiment_batch,documents[s:e],type="sentiment")
    sentiments.extend(data)
    s,e = e,e+10

keyphrases = []
s2,e2=0,10
while True:
    if len(documents)==len(keyphrases):
        break
    phrases_batch = text_analytics_client.get_keyphrases(documents[s2:e2])
    data = text_analytics_client.parse(phrases_batch,sentiments[s2:e2],type="keyphrases")
    keyphrases.extend(data)
    s2,e2 = e2,e2+10

entities_data = []
categories = []
s3,e3= 0,5
while True:
    if len(documents)==len(entities_data):
        break
    entities = text_analytics_client.get_entities(documents[s3:e3])
    data , category= text_analytics_client.parse(entities,keyphrases[s3:e3],type="entities")
    categories.extend(category)
    entities_data.extend(data)
    s3,e3 = e3,e3+5
categories = [('general',c) for c in set(categories)]
#### Batch Processing to Get Health Related Entites

consolidated = []
health_cats = []
s4,e4= 0,5
while True:
    if len(documents)==len(consolidated):
        break
    health_entities = text_analytics_client.get_health_entities(documents[s4:e4])
    data , category= text_analytics_client.parse(health_entities,entities_data[s4:e4],type="health")
    health_cats.extend(category)
    consolidated.extend(data)
    s4,e4 = e4,e4+5
categories.extend([('health',c1) for c1 in set(health_cats)])

### Write final consolidated data into azure sql using JDBC Connector

def writeto_sql(dataframe, tableName, jdbcConnection):
    dataframe.write \
    .format("jdbc") \
    .mode("overwrite") \
    .option("url", jdbcConnection) \
    .option("dbtable", tableName) \
    .save()
    print("Data Written Successfully")

jdbcconnString = TokenLibrary.getSecret("aimlworkathonkv", "SQLTargetJdbc")
writeto_sql(entitiesDF, 'Load.Entities', jdbcconnString)
writeto_sql(finalDf, 'Load.ClaimFraudAnalyzedAIMLData', jdbcconnString)
